00001 !-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00002 ! Subroutine : PostCollision
00003 ! Revision   : 1.0 (2008-06-15)
00004 ! Author     : Carlos Rosales Fernandez [carlos.rosales.fernandez(at)gmail.com]
00005 !-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00017

00033 
00034  SUBROUTINE PostCollision
00035 
00036 ! Common Variables
00037  USE Domain
00038  USE LBMParams, ONLY : f, g
00039  USE MPIParams
00040  USE MPI
00041  IMPLICIT NONE
00042 
00043 ! Local Variables
00044  INTEGER :: count, i, j
00045  INTEGER :: MPI_ERR, MPI_REQ
00046  INTEGER :: status(MPI_STATUS_SIZE)
00047 
00048 
00049 !-------- Save data for outward f and inward g components ----------------------
00050 ! X DIRECTION
00051  count = 1
00052  DO j = yl, yu
00053    f_west_snd(count)          = f(xl ,j,1,now)
00054    g_west_snd(count)          = g(xlg,j,3,nxt)
00055    g_west_snd(count + xsize)  = g(xlg,j,6,nxt)
00056    g_west_snd(count + xsize2) = g(xlg,j,7,nxt)
00057 
00058    f_east_snd(count)          = f(xu ,j,3,now)
00059    g_east_snd(count)          = g(xug,j,1,nxt)
00060    g_east_snd(count + xsize)  = g(xug,j,5,nxt)
00061    g_east_snd(count + xsize2) = g(xug,j,8,nxt)
00062    count = count + 1
00063  END DO
00064 
00065 ! Y DIRECTION
00066  count = 1
00067  DO i = xl, xu
00068    f_south_snd(count)          = f(i,yl ,2,now)
00069    g_south_snd(count)          = g(i,ylg,4,nxt)
00070    g_south_snd(count + ysize)  = g(i,ylg,7,nxt)
00071    g_south_snd(count + ysize2) = g(i,ylg,8,nxt)
00072 
00073    f_north_snd(count)          = f(i,yu ,4,now)
00074    g_north_snd(count)          = g(i,yug,2,nxt)
00075    g_north_snd(count + ysize)  = g(i,yug,5,nxt)
00076    g_north_snd(count + ysize2) = g(i,yug,6,nxt)
00077    count = count + 1
00078  END DO
00079 
00080 ! DIAGONALS
00081  g_ne_snd = g(xug,yug,5,nxt)
00082  g_nw_snd = g(xlg,yug,6,nxt)
00083  g_sw_snd = g(xlg,ylg,7,nxt)
00084  g_se_snd = g(xug,ylg,8,nxt)
00085 
00086 !-------- Exchange information using MPI calls ---------------------------------
00087 ! X DIRECTION
00088  CALL MPI_IRECV(f_east_rcv, xsize, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, east, TAG1, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_REQ, MPI_ERR)
00089  CALL MPI_SEND( f_west_snd, xsize, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, west, TAG1, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00090  CALL MPI_WAIT(MPI_REQ, status, MPI_ERR)
00091 
00092  CALL MPI_IRECV(g_east_rcv, xsize3, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, east, TAG2, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_REQ, MPI_ERR)
00093  CALL MPI_SEND( g_west_snd, xsize3, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, west, TAG2, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00094  CALL MPI_WAIT(MPI_REQ, status, MPI_ERR)
00095 
00096  CALL MPI_IRECV(f_west_rcv, xsize, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, west, TAG3, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_REQ, MPI_ERR)
00097  CALL MPI_SEND( f_east_snd, xsize, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, east, TAG3, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00098  CALL MPI_WAIT(MPI_REQ, status, MPI_ERR)
00099 
00100  CALL MPI_IRECV(g_west_rcv, xsize3, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, west, TAG4, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_REQ, MPI_ERR)
00101  CALL MPI_SEND( g_east_snd, xsize3, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, east, TAG4, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00102  CALL MPI_WAIT(MPI_REQ, status, MPI_ERR)
00103 
00104 ! Y DIRECTION
00105  CALL MPI_IRECV(f_north_rcv, ysize, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, north, TAG1, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_REQ, MPI_ERR)
00106  CALL MPI_SEND( f_south_snd, ysize, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, south, TAG1, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00107  CALL MPI_WAIT(MPI_REQ, status, MPI_ERR)
00108 
00109  CALL MPI_IRECV(g_north_rcv, ysize3, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, north, TAG2, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_REQ, MPI_ERR)
00110  CALL MPI_SEND( g_south_snd, ysize3, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, south, TAG2, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00111  CALL MPI_WAIT(MPI_REQ, status, MPI_ERR)
00112 
00113  CALL MPI_IRECV(f_south_rcv, ysize, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, south, TAG3, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_REQ, MPI_ERR)
00114  CALL MPI_SEND( f_north_snd, ysize, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, north, TAG3, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00115  CALL MPI_WAIT(MPI_REQ, status, MPI_ERR)
00116 
00117  CALL MPI_IRECV(g_south_rcv, ysize3, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, south, TAG4, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_REQ, MPI_ERR)
00118  CALL MPI_SEND( g_north_snd, ysize3, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, north, TAG4, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00119  CALL MPI_WAIT(MPI_REQ, status, MPI_ERR)
00120 
00121 ! DIAGONALS
00122  CALL MPI_IRECV(g_ne_rcv, 1, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, ne, TAG1, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_REQ, MPI_ERR)
00123  CALL MPI_SEND( g_sw_snd, 1, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, sw, TAG1, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00124  CALL MPI_WAIT(MPI_REQ, status, MPI_ERR)
00125 
00126  CALL MPI_IRECV(g_nw_rcv, 1, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, nw, TAG2, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_REQ, MPI_ERR)
00127  CALL MPI_SEND( g_se_snd, 1, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, se, TAG2, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00128  CALL MPI_WAIT(MPI_REQ, status, MPI_ERR)
00129 
00130  CALL MPI_IRECV(g_se_rcv, 1, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, se, TAG3, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_REQ, MPI_ERR)
00131  CALL MPI_SEND( g_nw_snd, 1, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, nw, TAG3, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00132  CALL MPI_WAIT(MPI_REQ, status, MPI_ERR)
00133 
00134  CALL MPI_IRECV(g_sw_rcv, 1, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, sw, TAG4, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_REQ, MPI_ERR)
00135  CALL MPI_SEND( g_ne_snd, 1, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, ne, TAG4, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00136  CALL MPI_WAIT(MPI_REQ, status, MPI_ERR)
00137 
00138 !-------- Update outward pointing f components for the ghosts ------------------
00139 ! x direction
00140  count = 1
00141  DO j = yl, yu
00142    f(xug,j,1,now) = f_east_rcv(count)
00143    f(xlg,j,3,now) = f_west_rcv(count)
00144    count = count + 1
00145  END DO
00146 
00147 ! y direction
00148  count = 1
00149  DO i = xl, xu
00150    f(i,yug,2,now) = f_north_rcv(count)
00151    f(i,ylg,4,now) = f_south_rcv(count)
00152    count = count + 1
00153  END DO
00154 
00155  RETURN
00156  END SUBROUTINE PostCollision
00157
